entry.content:
\Test page aksjd ksjkdas asdjasd jasdjk asd jad jkdjs;aadassd jsdja

asddasasdasd
asdsadsdsdasdsdsdaasdas
asddasjoiasdn asdjasd jasdjkasd kasdjasd. jkasjasd; jas j;as j;as; jka kas jkaj; asd jk;as jkasd; jkasd jasdj; asd jads; jas j;ads; ja; jasd jasd; asd jasd jasds j 

Str::of($translation)->startsWith(self::translateUniquePath($method));

public function __call(string $method, array $parameters): string
    {
        $translation = __(self::translateUniquePath($method, $this->name) , [], $parameters[0] ?? null);

        if (Str::of($translation)->startsWith(self::translateUniquePath($method, $this->name))) {
            $translation = __(self::translateUniqueFallbackPath($this->name), [], $parameters[0] ?? null);

            if (Str::of($translation)->startsWith(self::translateUniqueFallbackPath($this->name))) {
                throw new TranslationMissing(self::class, $method);
            }
        }

        return $translation;
    }

const test = ({ name }: {name: string}) => {
  console.log(`this is typescript, ${name}.`);
}

Bob ciao
